scripts.manifest:local: npm run manifest -- local local-31337-0 && npm run codegen
scripts.manifest:testing:amoy: npm run manifest -- testing testing-80002-0 && npm run codegen
scripts.manifest:testing:sepolia: npm run manifest -- testing testing-11155111-0 && npm run codegen
scripts.manifest:staging:amoy: npm run manifest -- staging staging-80002-0 && npm run codegen
scripts.manifest:staging:sepolia: npm run manifest -- staging staging-11155111-0 && npm run codegen
scripts.manifest:production:polygon: npm run manifest -- production production-137-0 && npm run codegen
scripts.manifest:production:ethereum: npm run manifest -- production production-1-0 && npm run codegen
scripts.deploy:local: npm run manifest:local && npm run create:local && npm run deploy:cmd:local
scripts.deploy:testing:amoy: npm run manifest:testing:amoy && npm run deploy:cmd:testing:amoy && npm run post-deploy:ormi -- --env=testing_amoy
scripts.deploy:testing:sepolia: npm run manifest:testing:sepolia && npm run deploy:cmd:testing:sepolia && npm run post-deploy:ormi -- --env=testing_sepolia
scripts.deploy:staging:amoy: npm run manifest:staging:amoy && npm run deploy:cmd:staging:amoy && npm run post-deploy:ormi -- --env=staging_amoy
scripts.deploy:staging:sepolia: npm run manifest:staging:sepolia && npm run deploy:cmd:staging:sepolia && npm run post-deploy:ormi -- --env=staging_sepolia
scripts.deploy:production:polygon: npm run manifest:production:polygon && npm run deploy:cmd:production:polygon && npm run post-deploy:ormi -- --env=production_polygon
scripts.deploy:production:ethereum: npm run manifest:production:ethereum && npm run deploy:cmd:production:ethereum && npm run post-deploy:ormi -- --env=production_ethereum
